list.name: Agent of the Grave
list.short_description: Promising servant of the Whispering Way.

list.name: Aldori Swordlord
list.short_description: Disciplined duelist from Brevoy.

list.name: Arcane Archer
list.short_description: An arcane spellcaster who draws upon ancient elven traditions to infuse his arrows with potent magical power.

list.name: Arcane Trickster
list.short_description: A troublemaker and a scoundrel who uses arcane magic to enhance her thievery and trickery.

list.name: Arclord of Nex
list.short_description: Formally trained Nexian diviner.

list.name: Argent Dramaturge
list.short_description: Bard who wields anti-fiend magic

list.name: Asavir
list.short_description: Al-Zabriti horseman with a genie-blessed horse

list.name: Ashavic Dancer
list.short_description: Servants of Ashava who use mystical dances to bring rest to the undead

list.name: Aspis Agent
list.short_description: Unscrupulous mercenary treasure hunter.

list.name: Assassin
list.short_description: A remorseless murderer who kills for money and the sheer thrill of death-dealing.

list.name: Balanced Scale of Abadar
list.short_description: Treasure seeking servant of Abadar.

list.name: Battle Herald
list.short_description: A veteran whose masterful tactics and air of command inspire allies to greater feats of heroism.

list.name: Bellflower Tiller
list.short_description: Halfling freedom fighter of Cheliax.

list.name: Blackfire Adept
list.short_description: Evil summoner of fiends.

list.name: Bloatmage
list.short_description: Master of the arcane art of hemotheurgy.

list.name: Brewkeeper
list.short_description: Sacred brewers of Cayden Cailean who can distill spells into liquor

list.name: Brightness Seeker
list.short_description: Revered seer of elven-kind.

list.name: Brother of the Seal
list.short_description: Guardian of ancient secrets.

list.name: Champion of Irori
list.short_description: Devout hand-to-hand master.

list.name: Chernasardo Warden
list.short_description: Chernasardo warden is a title that few can reasonably hope to earn. Among the freedom fighters, wardens have proven themselves again and again, taking on enemies that threaten the fate of Nirmathas.

list.name: Chevalier
list.short_description: A heroic do-gooder with Cayden Cailean aspirations.

list.name: Crimson Templar
list.short_description: Holy warriors of Ragathiel who fight the forces of Hell with sacred fire

list.name: Cyphermage
list.short_description: Student of ancient history and runic lore, with a particular focus on the monuments and magics of ancient Thassilon.

list.name: Daggermark Poisoner
list.short_description: Devious and crafty toxicologist.

list.name: Daivrat
list.short_description: Friend of genies, diplomat amongst their kind.

list.name: Darechaser
list.short_description: Athletes of Kurgess who push themselves to exceed their limits

list.name: Dawnflower Anchorite
list.short_description: Hermits of Sarenrae who channel light to smite their foes.

list.name: Dawnflower Dissident
list.short_description: Secretive emissary of Sarenrae.

list.name: Death Slayer
list.short_description: Hired assassin of the undead

list.name: Demoniac
list.short_description: Servant to a powerful Demon Lord.

list.name: Devoted Muse
list.short_description: Muses of Shelyn who have mastered an artistic form of combat for self-defense

list.name: Diabolist
list.short_description: Those who seek to control the power of Hell.

list.name: Divine Scion
list.short_description: Chosen by a god to fulfill a sacred mission, the divine scion has the spark of divinity within them.

list.name: Dragon Disciple
list.short_description: An arcane spellcaster who has embraced his latent draconic heritage and, over the course of training and devotion, undergoes a partial transformation into a dragon.

list.name: Duelist
list.short_description: A swashbuckling swordfighter who relies upon grace, poise, and acrobatics to win the day.

list.name: Eldritch Knight
list.short_description: An arcane spellcaster who augments his magical skills with combat to create a deadly combination of weapons and magic.

list.name: Enchanting Courtesan
list.short_description: Diviners and enchanters who use their talents to become information brokers.

list.name: Envoy of Balance
list.short_description: Standing beyond good and evil, outside law and chaos, an envoy of balance serves as the countering force against any extremism that seeks to elevate one alignment above all others.

list.name: Esoteric Knight
list.short_description: Powerful warriors who combine martial technique with occult or elemental power

list.name: Evangelist
list.short_description: Of all the preeminent followers of the core deities, the evangelist is the hardest to predict and shows the most variety in her abilities.

list.name: Exalted
list.short_description: The exalted exemplifies the teachings of her faith. More than a religious leader, she is the embodiment of faith that all members of the religion strive to emulate.

list.name: Feysworn
list.short_description: Servents of the enigmatic Eldest

list.name: Genie Binder
list.short_description: Especially powerful conjurers compel genies into service as often as they pay them fairly in treasures or favors.

list.name: Golden Legionnaire
list.short_description: High-ranking protector of Andoran.

list.name: Gray Corsair
list.short_description: Naval member of Andor's Eagle Knights

list.name: Gray Gardener
list.short_description: Deadly agent of the Revolutionary Council.

list.name: Green Faith Acolyte
list.short_description: Talented member of a druidic order.

list.name: Halfling Opportunist
list.short_description: Halfling that makes his own luck.

list.name: Harrower
list.short_description: Spellcaster who can weave Harrow cards into her spells.

list.name: Hellknight
list.short_description: Disciplined executer of law.

list.name: Hellknight Signifer
list.short_description: Masked, magic-wielding Hellknight.

list.name: Heritor Knight
list.short_description: Knights of Iomedae that seek to emulate her mortal life.

list.name: Hinterlander
list.short_description: Archers of Erastil that guard frontier towns

list.name: Holy Vindicator
list.short_description: A pious warrior who spreads religion at the edge of a sword.

list.name: Horizon Walker
list.short_description: A scout and wanderer comfortable in even the strangest terrain.

list.name: Inheritor's Crusader
list.short_description: Righteous champion of Iomedae.

list.name: Inner Sea Pirate
list.short_description: Pirates of the Inner Sea region sail many different bodies of water in search of plunder.

list.name: Justicar
list.short_description: Holy enforcer of the teachings of Abadar.

list.name: Knight of Ozem
list.short_description: Zealous destroyer of undead.

list.name: Lantern Bearer
list.short_description: Elven eradicator of drow.

list.name: Liberator
list.short_description: The hope of slaves everywhere.

list.name: Lion Blade
list.short_description: Member of Taldor's most secretive school of fighting arts.

list.name: Living Monolith
list.short_description: Living monoliths are mortals who willingly take on the mantle of immortal warriors through ritual and devotion, imbuing themselves with the patience and eternal strength of stone.

list.name: Loremaster
list.short_description: A spellcaster who devotes his life to research and rumination upon the mysteries of the world.

list.name: Low Templar
list.short_description: Greedy crusader fighting the denizens of the Worldwound.

list.name: Magaambyan Arcanist
list.short_description: Benevolent student of Old-Mage Jatembe.

list.name: Mammoth Rider
list.short_description: Tamer of beasts in the northern wilds.

list.name: Master Chymist
list.short_description: An alchemist whose mutagens create an alternate, brutish personality.

list.name: Master Spy
list.short_description: An espionage expert specializing in disguises and striking swiftly from the shadows.

list.name: Mortal Usher
list.short_description: Servants of the psychopomps who can act where the psychopomps cannot

list.name: Mystery Cultist
list.short_description: These zealots hone their spellcasting powers in honor of their patron empyreal lord and dedicate their lives to the teachings of this entity.

list.name: Mystic Theurge
list.short_description: Equally devoted to divine and arcane magic, the mystic theurge combines both magical traditions into one incredibly diverse class.

list.name: Nature Warden
list.short_description: A master of the wilderness bonded spiritually to a fearsome animal companion.

list.name: Noble Scion
list.short_description: Resource-laden member of foreign royalty.

list.name: Pain Taster
list.short_description: For pain tasters, agony is more than a pleasure-it's a path to power.

list.name: Pathfinder Chronicler
list.short_description: An explorer at heart, the Pathfinder chronicler travels to distant, exotic lands to expand her knowledge of the world.

list.name: Pathfinder Delver
list.short_description: Grand adventure seeker of the Pathfinder Society.

list.name: Pathfinder Field Agent
list.short_description: Equipped with a variety of skills and trained to keep a cool head even in the most dire circumstances, a practiced Pathfinder field agent is a boon to any adventuring party.

list.name: Pathfinder Savant
list.short_description: Master sage of the Pathfinder Society.

list.name: Pit Fighter
list.short_description: Gladiatorial brawler and performer.

list.name: Proctor
list.short_description: Ardent worshipers of a monitor demigod: an aeon, primal inevitable, protean lord, or psychopomp usher.

list.name: Prophet of Kalistrade
list.short_description: Savvy mercantile spellcaster.

list.name: Pure Legion Enforcer
list.short_description: The Pure Legion is a government-sponsored military organization created to enforce the Laws of Man within Rahadoum's borders and territorial waters.

list.name: Rage Prophet
list.short_description: A bold and barbaric champion who embraces otherworldly powers in order to perfect the art of combat.

list.name: Razmiran Priest
list.short_description: False divine caster of Razmir.

list.name: Red Mantis Assassin
list.short_description: Elite assassin of the Red Mantis cult.

list.name: Riftwarden
list.short_description: Sealer of extraplanar portals.

list.name: Ritualist
list.short_description: Individuals who specialize in using occult rituals, being able to perform rituals more quickly and easily

list.name: Rivethun Emissary
list.short_description: Animists of a dwarven spiritual religion

list.name: Rose Warden
list.short_description: Champions of Milani who protect and guide revolutions

list.name: Runeguard
list.short_description: Arcanists of Soralyon who use the benevolent form of ancient Thassilonian rune magic

list.name: Sacred Sentinel
list.short_description: Guardians of Torag that serve as a shield for their allies.

list.name: Sanguine Angel
list.short_description: Former Gray Maidens who have entered the service of Cheliax and the Queens of the Night

list.name: Scar Seeker
list.short_description: Followers of Vildeis who scar their bodies to prove their devotion

list.name: Sentinel
list.short_description: The sentinel is a warrior who receives special powers in exchange for his service to a deity, and often serves as a guard for the deity's clergy.

list.name: Shackles Pirate
list.short_description: Gifted pirate of the Shackles.

list.name: Shadowdancer
list.short_description: A mysterious adventurer who walks the boundaries between the real world and the realm of shadows, and who can command shadows to do her bidding.

list.name: Shieldmarshal
list.short_description: Gun-wielding officer of Alkenstar.

list.name: Skyseeker
list.short_description: Excavator of dwarven Sky Citadels.

list.name: Sleepless Detective
list.short_description: Expert urban sleuthhound.

list.name: Soul Warden
list.short_description: Bygone products of an ancient war, soul wardens are an enigma of themselves. The original soul wardens were a specially trained cadre of anti-necromantic commandos in the Nexian army during the Age of Destiny.

list.name: Souldrinker
list.short_description: Pledged to the Horsemen of the Apocalypse, the souldrinker learns the worst of daemonic magic while gaining the ability to bind and devour souls.

list.name: Sphere Singer
list.short_description: Wanderers of Desna who manipulate dreams and luck to aid their travels

list.name: Spherewalker
list.short_description: Magical traveler of Desna.

list.name: Stalwart Defender
list.short_description: A master of defending territory and holding the line at all costs.

list.name: Stargazer
list.short_description: Astronomers of Pulura who look to the heaven for guidance

list.name: Steel Falcon
list.short_description: Member of Andoran's elite military force.

list.name: Storm Kindler
list.short_description: Gozreh-worshiping hurricane hunter.

list.name: Student of Perfection
list.short_description: Member of one of the Houses of Perfection

list.name: Student of War
list.short_description: Learned martial scholar of the Pathfinder Society.

list.name: Tattooed Mystic
list.short_description: Wandering Varisian magician.

list.name: Technomancer
list.short_description: The true power in Numeria lies with the Technic League, not the Black Sovereign, and it is technomancers who rule the League.

list.name: Thuvian Alchemist
list.short_description: Using the long-neglected art of herbalism and the reinvigorated science of alchemy, the Thuvian Alchemist specializes on a practice that combines the two.

list.name: Twilight Talon
list.short_description: Secret agents of Andor

list.name: Ulfen Guard
list.short_description: After centuries of raiding and pillaging throughout Avistan, the Ulfen have earned their reputation for ferocity and fearlessness. Though seemingly at odds with this perception of barbarism, Ulfen are also known for their staunch loyalty, strong sense of honor, and unyielding resolve.

list.name: Umbral Court Agent
list.short_description: Nidalese shadow saboteur.

list.name: Veiled Illusionist
list.short_description: Shadowy shapechanger.

list.name: Westcrown Devil
list.short_description: Agent of the Council of Thieves

list.name: Winter Witch
list.short_description: Master of ice and snow.
